(1) Introduction to futures trading
(2) Overview of the futures market structure and systems
(3) Mastering futures trading techniques
The hands-on training will familiarize students with the operation of the futures market, help them interpret commodity futures prices, and enable them to perform basic trading actions (such as opening and closing positions).
Futures Trading Process:
(1) Opening an account
(2) Placing and executing opening/closing orders
(3) Calculating trading profits and losses
